abstracts.cdata!:
The Road Sector Development Phase 2
            Project - APL2, within its support to the overall Road
            Sector Development Program Phase II, will increase the road
            transport infrastructure and improve its reliability,
            strengthen the capacity for road construction, management
            and maintenance, and ensure sustainability and create
            conditions conducive to private sector participation in the
            road transport sector. These objectives are achievable
            through: (a) construction, rehabilitation, upgrading and
            preserving the priority federal and regional road network;
            (b) strengthened Ethiopian Roads Authority reform program;
            (c) developing the capacity in program implementation; and
            (d) improving rural travel and transport services.
